chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
items.plainText: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

items.text: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.
items.plainText: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

items.text: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.
items.plainText: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

items.text: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;
items.plainText: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;

items.text: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.
items.plainText: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.

items.text: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
items.plainText: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.

items.text: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the LORD for a drink offering.
items.plainText: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the LORD for a drink offering.

items.text: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.
items.plainText: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.

items.text: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:
items.plainText: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

items.text: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
items.plainText: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

items.text: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;
items.plainText: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

items.text: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;
items.plainText: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

items.text: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
items.plainText: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.

items.text: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.
items.plainText: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

items.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
items.plainText: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

items.text: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.
items.plainText: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.

items.text: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
items.plainText: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

items.text: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:
items.plainText: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:

items.text: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:
items.plainText: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

items.text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;
items.plainText: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

items.text: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
items.plainText: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

items.text: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.
items.plainText: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

items.text: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.
items.plainText: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

items.text: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.
items.plainText: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

items.text: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.
items.plainText: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

items.text: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the LORD, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:
items.plainText: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the LORD, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

items.text: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;
items.plainText: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

items.text: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,
items.plainText: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,

items.text: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;
items.plainText: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

items.text: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.
items.plainText: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

items.text: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
items.plainText: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
